thread.title: McCrory: Bond issue could give UNC Charlotte $90 million science building
thread.title_full: McCrory: Bond issue could give UNC Charlotte $90 million science building - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: McCrory: Bond issue could give UNC Charlotte $90 million science building
text: Gov. Pat McCrory on Thursday was blunt about his reaction to UNC Charlotte ’s aged science building: “It wasn’t pretty.” But if voters approve the $2 billion bond issue he’s pushed for months, McCrory said a new, $90 million science facility
